title.narrative: 2.1 CP- STRENGTHEN JUSTICE FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: 2.1 CP- By 2017 justice system for children is strengthened, which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Justice For Children, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017 improved quality social services are available and utilized, so disparities and inequalities are reduced in Child Protection
